tools.kdf.title: Key Derivation Function
tools.kdf.description: PBKDF2, bcrypt password hashing and key derivation
tools.kdf.pbkdf2Info: PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2) is a key derivation function that applies multiple iterations of hashing to increase the difficulty of brute-force attacks. Recommended iterations: at least 100,000 for SHA-256.
tools.kdf.bcryptInfo: bcrypt is an adaptive password hashing function with built-in salt generation. The cost factor controls computational complexity - each increment doubles the computation time. Recommended cost factor: 10-12.
tools.kdf.errorInvalidSalt: Salt must be a valid hex string
tools.kdf.errorInvalidKeyLength: Key length must be between 1 and 512 bytes
tools.kdf.errorInvalidCost: Cost factor must be between 4 and 31
tools.kdf.errorNoHash: Please enter a hash to verify
